Summary: Disk slowly approached from across White River & passed near group waiting fireworks to begin
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rockaway Beach
There was one other sighting in Rockaway Beach on or around July 4th 2010
divs: sighting detailssince the 2 reporting witnesses live in iowa, this missouri incident is being reported by investigator beverly trout, chief investigator for mufon in iowa. while waiting for fireworks to begin on july 4, 2010, 5 adults were gathered at rockaway beach, missouri to watch the fireworks at 9:00 p.m. it was heavy (astronomical) dusk, and they were waiting for dark (which occurred at 9:24 p.m.) the crowd was in a park on the north bank of the white river, facing south looking out on the river when they saw a silent object slowly approaching. they specify that a light on the underside looked fiery orange. object passed within 1\4 mile or less to their right and after passing behind some trees, made an abrupt left turn and departed the area. sighting lasted between 10-15 minutes, during which time the group commented and argued about what they were seeing. see investigation report for more detail.
